statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers_ethical_practices;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers_ethical_practices;
SELECT supplier_name, compliance_level FROM suppliers_ethical_practices WHERE compliance_level = 'Full Compliance';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, ethical_evaluation FROM suppliers_ethical_practices ORDER BY ethical_evaluation DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers_ethical_practices WHERE supplier_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM suppliers_ethical_practices ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers_ethical_practices WHERE compliance_level='Full Compliance';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers_ethical_practices WHERE ethical_evaluation < '2021-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers_ethical_practices WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT supplier_name, compliance_level FROM suppliers_ethical_practices WHERE ethical_evaluation BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT company_name, contact_person FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, company_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE ethics_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain;
SELECT product_id, production_location FROM supply_chain WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT company_name, contact_person FROM suppliers ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain WHERE production_location = 'USA' AND product_id = 5;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM supply_chain GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING product_count > 3;
SELECT company_name, contact_person, ethics_rating FROM suppliers JOIN supply_chain ON suppliers.supplier_id = supply_chain.supplier_id WHERE supply_chain.product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE ethical_practices_rating > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, ethical_practices_rating FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT review_id, review_date, reviewer_name, review_rating FROM supplier_reviews WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND review_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, ethical_practices_rating FROM suppliers WHERE ethical_practices_rating > 4;

SELECT s.supplier_name, c.contact_name, r.review_rating FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN supplier_contacts c ON s.supplier_id = c.supplier_id INNER JOIN supplier_reviews r ON s.supplier_id = r.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, supplier_location DESC;
SELECT s.supplier_name, r.review_date, r.reviewer_name, r.review_comment FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN supplier_reviews r ON s.supplier_id = r.supplier_id WHERE r.review_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, audit_date FROM audits WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT audits.audit_id, suppliers.supplier_name, audits.result FROM audits JOIN suppliers ON audits.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE audits.result = 'Failed';
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, ethical_rating FROM suppliers WHERE ethical_rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 AND stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT audits.audit_id, audits.audit_date, audits.result, suppliers.supplier_name FROM audits INNER JOIN suppliers ON audits.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;

SELECT audits.audit_id, audits.audit_date, violations.violation_description FROM audits LEFT JOIN violations ON audits.audit_id = violations.audit_id WHERE violations.violation_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY audits.audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT name, location, ethical_rating FROM suppliers ORDER BY ethical_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT id, audit_date, result FROM audits WHERE result = 'Failed' AND audit_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers WHERE ethical_rating > 3;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, c.name AS certification_name FROM products p JOIN certifications c ON p.supplier_id = c.supplier_id;
SELECT v.violation_type, v.violation_date, s.name AS supplier_name FROM violations v JOIN suppliers s ON v.supplier_id = s.id WHERE v.violation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.name AS product_name, p.price, a.audit_date, a.result FROM products p JOIN audits a ON p.supplier_id = a.supplier_id ORDER BY a.audit_date DESC, p.price DESC;
